alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Hooker; McPherson; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cherry, eastern Hooker, north central McPherson and western Thomas Counties through 715 PM CDT/615 PM MDT/... At 637 PM CDT/537 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Seneca to 15 miles northwest of Tryon. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mullen, Thedford, Seneca, Brownlee, Norway, Highway 97 crossing the Dismal River, Giant Hill, Kelso, Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 181 and 210. Highway 97 between mile markers 44 and 84. Highway 83 between mile markers 157 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Hooker; McPherson; Thomas; Western Cherry
